page.title: 12SOUTH EALING PARKS
page.content: {Gunnersbury Park,}former Rothschild estate. Largest and most popular park. Attractions: boating lake, two ponds, museum, sports facilities. Suggestions for improvement: sports centre, mini- railway, nature reserve, picnic area. {Lammas and Walpole Parks,}two central widely used, neighbouring parks. Green oases in a busy suburb.Bowls & tennis. Walpole has water garden & menagerie. {Boston Manor Park,}on Ealing/Hounslow border has a lovely house, trees and water garden, overshadowed by raised section of M4 motorway which bisects the park and shatters the peace. { M4 Monster in Boston Manor Park:} A monster stands in a peaceful place, Concrete centipede, legs sprawled out. Rumble, nibble, forever hungry, Swallowing traffic. A putrid smell of fumes and roaring sound, pollute the air all around.
